it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.conditions

Interface Condition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanShoot, DifferentTargetsInList, Distance, ExecutedActionUnits, HasAmmo, HasTargetedAmmo, HaveTargetsAtDistance, IsAttackerTile, IsNotAttackerTile, IsRoomVisible, IsTargetInActionUnitTargetList, IsTargetInDamageTargetList, IsTargetInTargetList, IsTargetListInDirection, IsTargetListNotVisible, IsTargetListVisible, IsTargetNotInActionUnitTargetList, IsTargetNotInDamageTargetList, IsTargetNotInTargetList, IsTileListVisible, IsUnidirectional, MaxDistance, MinDistance, OneDirectionMovement, OneTileOneTarget, PlayerNotInRoom, TargetListOnDifferentTiles

    public interface Condition
    The Condition interface gives a common method for all different conditions to be met by a card before activating its effect.
    Author:
    andreahuang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(Game game, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
      The check method receives the game and evaluates the targets depending on the condition which is deserialized directly from the json file of the cards.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        boolean check(Game game,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
        The check method receives the game and evaluates the targets depending on the condition which is deserialized directly from the json file of the cards.
        Parameters:
        game - the game on which to perform the evaluation.
        targets - the targets is the input of the current player. Either tiles or players.
        Returns:
        a boolean, result of the condition evaluation.
